des: "A delicious and imaginative twist on the traditional pina colada. Dragon fruit adds exotic and refreshing flavor. Garnish with pineapple and dragon fruit slices."
ins: Fill a blender halfway with ice cubes. Scoop out flesh from dragon fruit half and place in the blender. Add cream of coconut, rum, coconut milk, and pineapple chunks; puree until smooth. Pour into 2 glasses.
